Name: Bloody Mice
About the game: It is time to annihilate those damn mice! Try to get more points and defeat your friends in the ranking. Do not let those rats proliferate and rule the world! Kill as many rats as you can by controlling two basketballs. Try to make as many combos and hits as you can to boost your points. In the end send and compare your score in the world ranking.
